Description: Rim sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: around rim, reversed 'Z' band between pairs of lines; reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see British Museum 1924,1201.851.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0952) (phase 2)
